reviewText: I bought this for my 3yo grandson who just loves Bob as well as Thomas the Train. He opened this video,his "follow me scoop" and a "thomas" toolbox,said "thank you" then proceeded up to his room---that's all he needed for Christmas!!

The stories on this one are good, but they have new voices for some of the characters. I liked the old ones best. Bob always sounded so sweet and kind. The new Bob voice is all right, but different. Overall it is still a great DVD.
